name: Woehrdersee Hotel Mercure Nuernberg City

reviews.text: Stayed at this hotel during a recent exhibition in Nuremberg - the hotel is well located about a 10 min walk from the city centre and railway station and 20-25 mins from the airport and 15 mins from the exhibition centre
reviews.title: Messe Trip

reviews.text: I had one of the renovated rooms with modern bathroom facilities, flat screen TV and modern decor - the shower is a glass affair which looks into the room - a little disconcerting if you are sharing the room as your room mate can see you in the shower from the room....OK if you are on your own
reviews.title: it's ok...

reviews.text: The staff were very helpful - from check-in to restaurant staff who help some arab colleagues with the menu in terms of suitability etc
reviews.title: No Value for Money

reviews.text: i boooked via hotel.de roulette for 50 Euro the night including breakfast buffet which was very reasonable. you can walk ftom railway station or go by tram nr. 5 2 stations. daily ticket for 4 euro. buffet was little poor. hotel had very nice new design with glass wall bathroom, flat screen tv, nice colours. also in city center you can walk. nearby is HDI- Office (Insurance). Hot Water Cooker in the room. Very nice staff.
reviews.title: new hotel with nice design, quiet location, near railway station
Outstanding staff
reviews.text: In 2005, I stayed at this hotel for a total of 75 days for business in Nurnberg. After working hours, we generally just walked 10 minutes to the old city for dinner and browsing. The walk thru Worderweise park was always a good exercise and not too long. The tram to the Haputbahnhoff was easy from the hotel and not too expensize with a weekly open pass. In Dec 2007, I brought my wife for my final trip during the Christkindlesmarkt and the week was very enjoyable for us. Again a simple walk or tram ride to the heart of the event.

But what really set this hotel off from others was the staff. They were very down to earth and accomodating. And very professional. They are well trained and do a great job. Kaled in the bar and dinning area will do anything you ask to make you stay pleasant.
reviews.title: Standard 4* Hotel
Cancellation Refund
reviews.text: Althought from the exterior look a bit old hotel the interior is very modern. the bedrooms are new and fashionable. The bathroom is literally in suite, since the shower is in the middle of the bedroom, only separated from the bed by a transparent glass wall, that could be a bit of a problem if you travel with someone who you don´t have enough confidence with.
The hotel is 15 minutes walking from the historical center of the city
reviews.title: Decent hotel close the main train station

likes.liked: — Free internet and secure bag check-in when our room was not ready
likes.disliked: — The spider problem on the outside of the building

reviews.text: City hotel, funny rooms with shower placed in the middle of the room, see through, good idea only for single travellers as you have to see the other person showering, cramped feeling, roll-away-bed was terrible, only part of the hotel was renovated, make sure you get newly renovated rooms, otherwise too expensive for the qualtiy, only one elevator working for 5 stories, breakfast good, restaurant also good, parking in garage cramped too,
reviews.title: Value if assigned the renovated rooms

reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised by this hotel. Clean, comfortable with amazing buffet breakfast (I'm not aware of many 4 start hotels that have a chef at breakfast too cook waffles, crepes and other hot food). Excellent value for Christmas Market time. My only criticism would be that it's not centrally located. However, it's minutes away from an S-bahn station and bus and tram stops for the centre, so this is not too big a problem. Would happily stay here again.
reviews.title: Comfortable With Excellent Breakfast

reviews.text: Stayed two nights. Liked the buffet breakfast. Front desk staff was very helpful. Room was functional, comfortable and quiet for sleeping. Windows open!
reviews.title: Close to the centre of town
Review of Woehrdersee Hotel Mercure Nuernberg City
reviews.text: Well situated; only two stops from the main train station by tram. Tram stops almost a the front door of the hotel. Hotel is an easy walk to the centre of town and therefore close to the Christmas Markets.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel staff provided a warm welcome and the service was great. The buffet breakfast was superb - a large and excellent variety of food. The main transport hub is only a short ride by tram (which stops near the hotel).
reviews.title: Disappointed, poor value for money
Christmas Market Weekend in Nurnberg
reviews.text: Have stayed at many Mercure hotels world wide, and this was very disappointing. First we were given keys to an uncleaned room. Once they gave us the correct room, we had to ask for extra pillows, then bathrobes, then internet access - all of which were to be included. Flooring wasn't nice, had molded areas. Although the room was to have coffee service, sadly it didn't have a coffee maker but a hot pot with granulated coffee, 2 each decaf and regular. Front desk staff raved that everything in the mini bar was included, that was two bottles of water and soda. Rain shower was a nice touch, but it dripped and was noisy. Sink not user friendly, stainless steel and at such an angle that it splashed you. They say it's 800 m from train station, that is underestimated, it's quite a walk. There was no cafe to get coffee in the day time. Many better lodging options in Nurnberg!

reviews.title: First Time Stay
reviews.text: We had stayed in this hotel years back - before they remodeled. We enjoyed our stay this time, as well, although the room took a little getting used to. The glass shower stall is pretty much in the center of the room and there is no door on the bathroom. It was OK for us, but wouldn't suit a person/couple who are used to privacy in the bathroom. Hotel location isn't exactly downtown, but we didn't mnd the walk plus the tram stop is just outside the front door. The breakfast was OUTSTANDING - one of the best/nicest hotel breakfasts we've had in Europe. And, last but not least, the staff was great - helpful and friendly. We'd stay there again.

description: The 4 star Wohrdersee Mercure Nurnberg City hotel is close to the city centre -1 km-, the main railway station -0.8 km- and the Exhibition centre -4 km-.
